Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.

Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

• Hesap bilgilerinizi ve hesap hareketlerinizi gözlemleyebilir, yeni hesap açabilir, Vadesiz TL hesabınız dışındaki tüm hesaplarınızı dilediğiniz zaman kapatabilirsiniz.
• Vadesiz TL hesabınıza bağlı Sanal Encard'ınızı oluşturabilir, kartınızın limitini aylık, günlük veya tek işlem için geçerli olacak şekilde tanımlayarak internetten alışverişlerde kullanabilirsiniz.
• Kredi kartı bilgilerinizi, ekstrelerinizi, dönem içi harcamalarınızı, provizyonda bekleyen işlemlerinizi, gelecek dönem taksitlerinizi gözlemleyebilir, kart borcunuzu ödeyebilir, nakit avans/taksitli nakit avans kullanabilir ve daha önce tek çekim olarak gerçekleştirdiğiniz harcamalarınızı sonradan taksitlendirebilir, kredi kartınıza bağlı olarak sanal kredi kartı oluşturabilirsiniz.
• Yeni bir ihtiyaç kredisi kullanabilir, mevcut kredilerinizi gözlemleyebilir, kredi ödemelerinizi yapabilir, dilediğiniz zaman kredilerinizi kapatabilirsiniz.
• Nakit ihtiyaçlarınızı karşılamak için Vadesiz TL hesabınıza Ekpara limiti tanımlayabilirsiniz.
• Ücretsiz olarak EFT, FAST, havale, Kolay Adres’e transfer (KOLAS) ve hesaplarınız arasında para transferi yapabilirsiniz. 
• Ücretsiz olarak cep telefonu numarasına para transferi yapabilirsiniz.
• Enpara dışına yabancı para transferi (SWIFT) yapabilirsiniz.
• Ücretsiz olarak anlaşmalı olduğumuz vakıf ve derneklere “Kalpten transfer” (bağış) yapabilirsiniz.
• Ücretsiz olarak fatura, başka banka kredi kartı, vergi, trafik cezası, SGK ve şans oyunu ödemelerinizi yapabilirsiniz.
• Ücretsiz olarak cep telefonuna TL yükleme işlemi yapabilirsiniz.
• En Hızlı ile daha önce kaydettiğiniz transfer ve ödeme işlemlerinizi çok hızlı bir şekilde gerçekleştirebilirsiniz.
• Para transferi, fatura ödeme, cep telefonuna TL yükleme, Enpara.com kredi kartı, vergi, SGK ve İstanbulkart ödemeleriniz için düzenli veya tek seferlik talimat oluşturabilirsiniz.
• 7/24 USD, EUR ve Altın alıp satabilirsiniz.
• Karekod ile kartınız yanınızda olmasa bile QNB ATM’lerini ücretsiz olarak kullanabilirsiniz.
• Kredi belgeleri, ürün sözleşmeleri ve diğer finansal içerikli belgelerinizi gözlemleyebilirsiniz.
• Hesap hareketlerinizi, varlık/borç dökümünüzü, hesap cüzdanınızı, işlem dekontlarınızı e-imzalı olarak alabilirsiniz.
• Ayarlarınızı, kişisel bilgilerinizi ve mobil bildirim tercihlerinizi güncelleyebilirsiniz.
• e-Devlet’e giriş yapabilirsiniz.
• Güncel mevduat ve kredi faiz oranlarımızı, döviz ve altın kurlarımızı takip edebilirsiniz.
• Ayın Enparalısı olup olmadığınızı ve size önerdiğimiz fırsatları takip edebilirsiniz.
• Size gönderdiğimiz mobil bildirimleri takip edebilirsiniz.
• Bizi tavsiye edebilirsiniz.
• Soru ve şikayetlerinizi bize yazabilirsiniz.
• En yakın QNB ATM’sinin nerede olduğunu öğrenebilirsiniz.
• Şifresiz giriş özelliği ile En Özet ekranında yer alan bilgileri şifre girmeden anında gözlemleyebilirsiniz.
• Henüz Enparalı değilseniz Enparalı olmak için başvuru yapabilirsiniz.

Why choose Bybit for your Bitcoin and cryptocurrency trades?

Seamless deposits and transfers

Portfolio diversification

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

Банк Assist – ваш финансовый ассистент в мире финансов. С помощью приложения вы можете проверить свой кредитный рейтинг одним нажатием кнопки. Честно отвечаете на поставленные вопросы и получаете честный ответ, насколько ваши ожидания совпадают с реальными возможностями.


А также у нас есть кредитный и ипотечный калькулятор, с помощью которых вы сможете оценить свои силы и принять решение о взятии кредита или ипотеки. Внесите базовые условия, приложение произведет расчет, который вы можете сохранить. Также у вас перед глазами будет точный график платежей, с указанием суммы ежемесячного платежа, количества процентов и основного долга. Это важная информация, вы сможете понять сколько вы заплатите процентов и какой кредит будет для вас более выгодным.


Кредитный скоринг – это оценка вашей кредитоспособности. С помощью неё вы сможете подавать заявки удаленно и получать по ним быстрые решения. Разработанный нами функционал с помощью тестовых вопросов начисляет вам баллы, далее суммирует и выводит ваш итоговый кредитный рейтинг. Внимание персональные данные при этом не запрашиваются! Необходимо честно отвечать на поставленные вопросы. 


По результатам анкетирования сервис принимает предварительное решение: дадут вам кредит или нет. Возможно не стоит больше брать кредитов, а лучше пройти процедуру банкротства физического лица.


На уровень вашего кредитного рейтинга влияет следующее:
- Ваша кредитная история
- Ваш возраст и в каком социальном положении вы находитесь
- Есть ли у вас финансовые обязательства
- И готовы ли вы предоставить дополнительную информацию о себе.


Кредитный скоринг ускоряет процесс рассмотрения заявок, экономит время и ресурсы, и позволяет вам увидеть полную картину вашего финансового потенциала.
Воспользуйтесь нашей полезной информацией, узнайте все об ипотечном кредитовании, видах ипотеки и их особенностях, этапах и тонкостях оформления. Информационные статьи и тесты для проверки вашего кредитного рейтинга.
Банк Assist ваш незаменимый помощник в принятии важных решений!

Официальный сайт и мобильное приложение "Rysgal" Акционерного Коммерческого Банка — это цифровая платформа, предлагающая широкий спектр современных банковских услуг, предоставляющая клиентам удобные и эффективные возможности. На этом сайте содержится полная информация об услугах банка, новостях и других полезных данных.

Услуги банка:

Счета: Доступна информация о платёжно-кассовых операциях, мультивалютных транзакциях и обменных курсах. Клиенты могут выполнять операции в различных валютах и отслеживать текущие курсы.
Кредиты: Предлагаются различные варианты кредитования для корпоративных клиентов, предпринимателей и физических лиц. Также имеется информация о залоге и калькулятор кредита.
Пластиковые карты: Приводится информация о картах Mastercard, правилах их выпуска и использования, а также о программе лояльности "Showly sowda".
Онлайн-услуги: Доступны услуги, такие как POS-терминалы, интернет-банкинг, оплата через QR-коды, видеоролики с инструкциями, проверка платежей, мобильный кошелёк и онлайн-приём.
Контактная информация: На сайте представлены номера телефонов и электронные адреса для связи с банком. Также имеется информация о адресах и телефонах офисов банка, расположенных в различных регионах.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

MEXC is one of the world's leading digital asset exchanges. With the lowest fees in the industry (zero fees), the most diverse range of trading pairs (3,000+), and a secure and reliable trading engine, MEXC delivers a top-tier trading experience, earning the trust of over 40 million users worldwide. MEXC makes trading more efficient and simple!

Through MEXC, you can get:
- Most Pairs: Over 3,000 listed trading pairs, allowing you to fully enjoy wealth opportunities.
- Lowest Fees: 0 maker fees for spot and futures trading, with 1bps–2bps taker fees.
- Best Depth: Industry-leading liquidity for smaller spreads, more stable trading, and faster execution.
- Higher Returns: $8,000 rewards for new users, and up to 60% yield for holding MX.
- Security Assurance: Every two months, the platform publishes its reserve assets and reserve ratio.

1. A Wide Variety of Cryptocurrencies
Explore over 3,000 crypto assets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Ripple (XRP), Tether (USDT), MX Token (MX), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), PEPE (PEPE), Notcoin (NOT), Toncoin (TON), USDC (USDC), Binance Coin (BNB), People DAO (PEOPLE), Chainlink (LINK), Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), Decentraland (MANA), Gala Games (GALA), Polygon (POL), and more.

2. 0 Trading Fees
- Spot Trading: 0 maker fees and 1bps–2bps taker fees.
- Futures Trading: 0 maker fees and 1bps–2bps taker fees.
- Hold 1,000+ MX: Enjoy 1bps taker fees (applicable to spot and futures trading).
- P2P: Wire transfers and over 30 options, with 0 fees for P2P trading.

3. Industry-Leading Liquidity
In futures and spot markets, the tradable volume at mid-price ±0.05% (5 bps) is significantly ahead of competitors. This results in smaller spreads, more stable trading, and faster execution.

4. Stable Returns
- Earn Tokens Through Trading: Participate in the daily M-Day event—the more you trade, the more you earn.
- MX Earnings: Hold MX to enjoy up to 60% returns.

5. Security assurance
We spare no effort in protecting the safety of your funds. MEXC publishes its platform reserves and reserve ratio every two months. You can always check the reserve ratios for Bitcoin (BTC), Tether (USDT), and Ethereum (ETH), among others.

description:
ICBC has tailored a mobile banking client for you, providing you with comprehensive mobile banking services and improving customer experience constantly. The client furnishes you with account inquiry, transfer and remittance, foreign exchange trading, time deposit and other banking services.

Our Mobile Banking app brings you a personalized online service platform. You can handle your banking needs anytime, anywhere, without visiting a branch.
1. Redesigned interface, enhanced experience: A sleek new UI with softer colors offers a more comfortable, eye-friendly experience, delivering high-quality service.
2. Customizable layout as your will: Easily add, remove, or rearrange features on your home screen. Tailor the layout to match your habits and preferences.
3. Streamlined and optimized features: Enjoy quick access to frequently used services like transfers, wealth management, and account tools at your touchpoint.
4. Comprehensive services, seamless navigation: Enjoy smoother operations with newly added sections for credit card borrowing, updates, and more.

Track real-time cryptocurrency prices, trading volume, transactions, liquidity data, and more on decentralized exchanges (DEX) across all blockchains. Brought to you by the team behind CoinGecko.

We provide price tracking and advanced charting tool for traders. You’re now able to:
- Track 2M+ cryptocurrencies data across 100+ chains
- Monitor the hottest trending pools
- Explore all newly created pools
- Build your on-chain watchlists
- Compare and rank DEXs and chains based on different metrics

Trending Pools
Find the most popular cryptocurrency pairs on-chain and see what the traders are looking at. Trading pairs that are trending include trump meme coins (TRUMP/SOL), ELON/WETH, AIXBT/WETH, and POPCAT/SOL.

New Pools
Explore the newest crypto pairs created on all networks, including Solana, Ethereum, BNB, Base, Arbitrum, Telegram TON network, SEI, SUI, and more. Discover the platforms where you can trade these new pools, including Jupiter Exchange, Raydium, Phantom, Soul Sniper, Uniswap, Pancakeswap, and more.

Watchlists
Create your watchlist to track your favorite tokens. Or even better, customize multiple watchlists for different investment needs!

DEX and Chain Rankings
Compare all DEXes and chains based on total value locked (TVL), trading volume, transactions, total pools, and total tokens. Track popular DEXes, including Raydium, Uniswap, Pancakeswap, Orca, Curve, Trader Joe, and more. The biggest chains we track include Ethereum, Solana, Arbitrum, BNB Chain, Avalanche, Optimism, and more.

The Venox app is only available for existing private clients of Venox IO - the ultimate solution for acquiring and storing a managed digital asset portfolio.

Venox has developed a platform that maximises security and returns, while minimising impact on the environment with full offsets of carbon produced by digital assets held in our portfolios.

Ýerleşýän ýeriňize garamazdan, tölegiňizi programmamyz arkaly aňsatlyk bilen töläp bilersiňiz. Ýaşaýyş jaý we jemgyýetçilik hyzmatlaryňyzy dolandyrmak hiç haçan beýle aňsat bolmandy.
Mundan başga-da, “Sanly şäher” size döwlet güwanamalaryna we resminamalaryna onlaýn ýüz tutmaga mümkinçilik berýär.

Welcome to Bitget. We are one of the world's leading crypto exchanges.

WITH BITGET, YOU CAN:
Trade spot: invest Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Bitget Token (BGB) and 150+ coins
Cryptocurrency news: find the latest cryptocurrency news and prices

SUPPORTED ASSETS
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Polkadot (DOT), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Dogecoin (DOGE), Tron (TRX), Uniswap (UNI), Ripple (XRP), Filecoin (FIL), and many more other 150+ cryptocurrencies.

Spot Trading
Buy or sell cryptocurrency and trade in the spot market. Invest more than 150 cryptocurrencies, such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Litecoin (LTC).


Deposit
Deposit into your Bitget account. Copy the deposit address or scan the QR code to transfer crypto from another exchange or crypto wallet.

Certainly! Here's a description for your iOS mobile banking application:

Description:

Welcome to Rysgal bank - your all-in-one solution for convenient and secure personal banking on the go. Our iOS app empowers you with a range of features designed to simplify your financial management and enhance your banking experience.

Key Features:

    Account Overview:
        Effortlessly view a comprehensive list of your accounts and cards in one place. Stay informed about your financial landscape at a glance.

    Transaction History:
        Dive into the details with a comprehensive transaction history. Track your expenses, income, and account activity with ease.

    Transfers Between Accounts:
        Seamlessly transfer funds between your accounts. Enjoy the flexibility to manage your finances and optimize your balance effortlessly.

    Templates for Efficiency:
        Save time with pre-defined templates for frequent transactions. Setting up templates ensures quick and accurate fund transfers whenever you need them.

    Card Details at Your Fingertips:
        Explore a dedicated page for each card. Access key details, recent transactions, and manage your cards with ease.

    Open New Products:
        Interested in exploring new financial products? Our app provides a simple and secure way to open new accounts or apply for additional services directly from your device.

    User-Friendly Settings:
        Tailor your banking experience with personalized settings. Customize alerts, notifications, and preferences to suit your unique needs.

Security and Peace of Mind:

At Rysgal bank, the security of your financial information is our top priority. Our app employs state-of-the-art security measures to ensure your data is protected at all times.

Get Started Today:
Download the Rysgal bank app now to unlock the full potential of mobile banking. Experience the convenience of managing your finances whenever and wherever you are.

Banking made simple, secure, and personalized - right in the palm of your hand.

Bu mobil goşunda, müşderi banka barmazdan möhletli goýum hasabynyň galyndysyny we oňa hasaplanan göterimlerini, karz galyndysyny, karz boýunça her aýda geçiren we geçirmeli tölegleriniň möçberini görüp bilýär hem-de töläp bilýär, sarp ediş karzdan, durmuş guran ýaş maşgalalara berilýän ýeňillikli karzlardan, şeýle hem toý we sadaka çärelerini geçirmek maksatly karzlardan peýdalanyp bilýär.
Şeýle-de raýatlar özlerinde bar bolan plastik kartlaryny bu goşunda birikdirip, daşary ýurtlarda bilim alýan talyplaryň her aýdaky töleglerini, karzy boýunça nobatdaky tölegini, islege görä karzyň bergisini möhletinden öň tölemeklige mümkinçiligi bolar.


В этом мобильном приложении клиент, не посещая банк, может просматривать и оплачивать остаток по срочному вкладу и начисленные по нему проценты, остаток по кредиту, а также сумму ежемесячных и предстоящих платежей по кредиту. Клиент также может воспользоваться потребительскими кредитами, льготными кредитами для молодых семей, а также кредитами на проведение свадеб и других мероприятий.
Кроме того, граждане могут привязать свои пластиковые карты в приложении, что позволит им оплачивать ежемесячные расходы студентов, обучающихся за рубежом, вносить очередные платежи по кредиту и, по желанию, досрочно погашать кредитную задолженность.

中国银行手机银行匠心打造“便民、富民、惠民、乐民”综合服务平台：推出六大客群专属服务，满足您多元化服务需求；提供六大王牌财富管理服务，全程陪伴您的财富旅程；升级美好生活平台，丰富生活服务供给；推出“福仔云游记”，趣味互动让您畅享美好生活。
一键开启，便捷为您。中国银行面向新市民、县域、养老、代发薪、少数民族、交通出行六大客群，打造专属服务体验。
一键解锁，智富为您。推出财富管理开放平台，财富购物车、家庭财富全景视图、资产报告和资产诊断、甄选产品池、陪伴式服务、全方位安全保障六大王牌财富服务，通过专业、智能的财富管理能力，帮您管好“钱袋子”。
一键触达，惠泽为您。上线重点帮扶公益版块，引入中行精准帮扶平台“公益中国”，助力乡村振兴，搭建“爱心捐款”公益版块，提供扶贫救灾、教育助学、扶老助残三类捐款通道；生活频道合作商户拓展至16大类400余户；全新升级权益中心，积分兑换权益更丰富。
一键乐享，快乐为您。聚合四大特色场景，推出“福仔云游记”养成类游戏，升级趣味玩法，让金融也可以很快乐。

Unlock the full power of your digital assets with RedotPay — a global stablecoin-based card and all-in-one payment app bridging digital currencies with everyday spending. Top up funds, spend, send — RedotPay makes it simple, secure, and borderless. With RedotPay, payments are always at your fingertips!
 
Join 5M+ users across 100+ countries and transform the way you manage crypto and local currencies today.
 
WHY CHOOSE REDOTPAY?
 • Spend crypto like cash at 130M+ merchants, POS locations & ATMs.
 • Send multi-market payouts with near-instant processing.

PAY WITH CRYPTO, WORLDWIDE
 • Stablecoin-Based Cards (Virtual & Physical): Pay with BTC, ETH, USDT, USDC & more at 130M+ merchants globally.
 • Mobile Payment: Tap to pay instantly online or in-store.
 • ATM Withdrawals: Instantly convert crypto to local currency — travel worry-free.
 • High Limits, Low Fees: Spend up to $100K per transaction at competitive rates.

ACCESS CREDIT WITH CRYPTO
 • Crypto Credit Account: Unlock credit against Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Tron (TRX), Ripple (XRP), Binance Coin (BNB), Toncoin (TON), or stablecoins without selling.
 • Flexible Repayment: No compounding interest or hidden fees — repay anytime.
Grow While Spending: Earn passive yield and use rewards instantly with your card.

FIAT ON-RAMP & GLOBAL PAYOUT
 • Currency Accounts: Deposit Euro (EUR) or Pound (GBP) via bank transfer and instantly swap to stablecoins.
 • Global Payout: Send crypto and let recipients receive local currency (e.g., BRL) in their bank accounts within minutes.
 • Seamless On/Off Ramp: Withdraw cash worldwide at ATMs — fast, secure, and worry-free travel. 
 • Online Shopping: Use crypto seamlessly for everyday purchases.

WALLET
 • Multi-Currency Wallet: Manage both crypto & local currencies in one secure app.
 • Free Transfers: Send crypto or local currency to friends and enjoy near-instant fund transfers.

REWARDS, GIFTS & VOUCHER
 • Referral Program: Invite friends and earn up to 40% commission on their transactions.
 • Gift Feature: Send personalized crypto gifts with custom cards & messages.
 • Vouchers & Cashback: Enjoy discounts, promotional rewards, and reduced fees.

COMPLIANCE & SECURITY YOU CAN TRUST
 • Globally Licensed: Authorized in multiple regions for money services, custody, and crypto services.
 • Multi-Layered Protection: Safeguard your account with 2FA, passkeys, anti-phishing codes, and gesture passwords.
 • Seamless Onboarding: ID verification under 5 minutes, giving you secure access anytime.

JOIN THE MOVEMENT
Be part of our growing global community and experience the future of borderless finance! Download RedotPay today and begin your journey toward financial freedom and inclusion.
 
Stay connected for updates, features & community events:
 • Website: www.RedotPay.com
 • Twitter: www.twitter.com/RedotPay
 • Instagram: www.instagram.com/RedotPay
 • Facebook: www.facebook.com/RedotPayOfficial
 • LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/RedotPayOfficial
 • Telegram: t.me/RedotPay
 • Discord: discord.gg/PCUd2JM2KJ
For more info, please contact: Support@RedotPay.com
For support, feedback & complaints please visit: https://url.hk/cs/as

description:
Galkynyş — это современное мобильное приложение, созданное для вашего удобства в повседневной работе с банком.
Приложение открывает новые возможности для взаимодействия с банковскими услугами: вы получаете доступ к необходимой информации, оперативным функциям и сервисам, которые позволяют оставаться на связи с банком в любое время и в любом месте.
Galkynyş помогает делать повседневные финансовые задачи проще, быстрее и безопаснее — с акцентом на удобство и надёжность.
Интерфейс приложения разработан с учётом потребностей клиентов и поддерживает несколько языков
С Galkynyş банковские сервисы становятся ближе.

Jump.Работа — бесплатное приложение для сотрудников. 
Работайте, как вам удобно — в штате, по ГПХ или самозанятым. 

Мы поможем оформить и подписать все необходимые документы без бумаги. 
Покажем вам детальную информацию о заработке с разбивкой по категориям.
Обеспечим перевод заработка моментально и круглосуточно 24/7.

Get more out of crypto

SUPPORTED NETWORKS
Ethereum, Linea, Solana, BSC, ZkSync, Base, Arbitrum, Avalanche, Polygon, Optimism, Sei, and more.


SUPPORTED TOKENS
Ether (ETH), MetaMask USD (mUSD), USD Coin (USDC), Tether (USDT), Wrapped Bitcoin (wBTC), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Pepe (PEPE), Dai (DAI), Dogecoin (DOGE), Cronos (CRO), Celo (CELO), and thousands more.


Download MetaMask today

“Money Manager Next” is an optimized application for personal account management. 

Household account management is complicated. But we make it simple by simplifying the things that are complex. The default settings will get you started, and once you get used to it, you can alter the settings according to your needs with the highly flexible and customizable functions available. 

- Super easy and simple to enter data anytime, anywhere. 
- View your spending tendencies graphically. 
- View statistics by simply entering the data. 
- Search and calculator functions. 
- Set up sub-categories and main categories as necessary. 
- Manage all your accounts at once. 
- Use multiple currencies. 
- Check weekly, monthly, and annual statistics. 
- Use calendar view. 
- Use budget planning features to plan weekly, monthly, and annual budgets. 
- Change the start date of the month. 

※ Applying double entry bookkeeping 
It facilitates efficient account management. Automally double entry bookkeeping. 

※ PC manager function 
You can view ‘“Money Manager” application using Wi-Fi. You can edit and sort the data by date, category or account group on the screen of your PC. In addition, you can see fluctuations of your accounts indicated on graphs on your PC. 

※ Budget management function 
You can manage your budget. It shows your budget and expenditures on a graph so you can compare the amount of your expenditures against your budget quickly. 

※ Credit Card / Debit Card management function 
When entering a future payment date, you can see the payment amount and outstanding balance on the accounts page. You can connect your debit card to your accounts so that expenses are automatically recorded under a specific account. 

※ Passcode 
You can speficy a desired time lapse before the app requests a passcode. 

※ Automatic money transfer and frequency functions 
You can set up automatic money transfers between your accounts and configure the frequency of those transfers. 

※ Sort expenses by recipient 
You can sort your expenses by recipient and view this information graphically. 

※ Payment Profiles 
You can easily enter frequent expenditures by creating payment profiles. 

※ Backup / Restore 
You can backup and restore your data via email, iTunes and iCloud. 

※ Multiple currency support – you can have individual entries in multiple currencies, and configure each account to calculate the total balance in your desired currency. 

In Full Version. (https://itunes.apple.com/app/id564730202?mt=8)
Manage from PC is available. 
There is no Ads. 
There is no limit the accounts. 
(In lite version, 10 accounts is available.)



Subscription pricing and terms:

Money Manager offers auto-renewing monthly subscription at US$2.49/month and an auto-renewing yearly subscription at US$19.99/year to provide you with unlimited access to the Money Manager Data Sync Service while you maintain an active subscription.

Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your iTunes Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase.
Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be identified. 
You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after the purchase. 

Read more about our terms and conditions here:
https://realbyteapps.com/policy/terms.html

Privacy Policy:
https://realbyteapps.com/policy/privacy.html

The main page and Services sections are located in the Sanly Bank mobile application of the State Commercial Bank of Turkmenistan.

In the main page section, there are banners promoting the services within the bank's limits, as well as sections for News and Articles that allow users to stay updated with the latest news in our country. Additionally, users can calculate their potential earnings from investments using the calculator available on the site.

The Services section of the mobile application includes an Online Reception area where online loan applications are accepted to meet users' needs. The online credit application section provides opportunities for executing digital loan transactions. Through the Internet banking service in the Services section, users can perform any payment transactions online. There is also a section for Online Bank Card Applications in the Services area, which enables users to easily and quickly obtain bank cards online.

With the online services of the State Commercial Bank of Turkmenistan's Sanly Bank mobile application, your business operations will be greatly simplified.
